reviews.review: sick game

Portal 2.....

The best story telling game that I've ever played.
Well, maybe it's not the best for everyone, but this was my first ever real story game that ive really finished and enjoyed playing.

Are "The Witness" enigmas more interesting ? Sure.
Was the Far Cry 4 story more developed? Maybe.
But the beautiful graphics (running high settings even on a potato computer), the humor of the characters and the nostalgia of the first episode are making it the best game I'll ever remember.

One of the best game i've ever played. Go buy it, it's cheap and it really worth it
really nice coop+workshop+great music= how could this be better

The first game was an incredible experience that taught us that just because we're bound by the physics of our world doesn't mean that we bend it, manipulate it and make it fun. First first game taught us the story and how to interact with the tools that allowed us to make portals and how to solve puzzles while learning how to do this.

The second game is no less amazing. It adds to the story and once again makes it just as interesting -- Valve's additional humor certainly contributes. I saw the new multiplayer feature as a valueable component and this game and it's not treated as a mere afterthought. You can play with strangers or with friends and it does well at finding other players quickly.

It never feels like work when playing this, but it will always remain as one of favorite thinking games.
Лучшая головоломка всех времён и народов а прохождение игры вдвоём не только интересно но и весело

Отличная головоломка. Проходя её в первый раз я получил тонну удовольствия. Каждый уровень заставляет задуматься и пораскинуть мозгами. А если вы захотите больше уровней после основной компании: есть кооперативный режим! Можете проходить карты, созданные сообществом, а также создавать свои личные карты

Jogo que te coloca nas visão da personagem, com o intuito de sobreviver aos testes feitos por dois robos e que fazem de tudo para tentar te ver morto.
Splendido seguito per un gioco innovativo. Alle meccaniche tradizionali ne aggiunge di nuove, e le modalità dei DLC rendono il gioco ancora più duraturo. Assolutamente un must have!

I go back and play both the original and the sequel every once in awhile, but it's Portal 2 that I love coming back to the most.  It's just such a well put together game - even a casual gamer who doesn't play first person games should love this.

I love this game and i live to see the day when Aperture and Black Mesa collide into a single game.

J'adore ce jeu !!! Je le posséde aussi sur console et je l'ai fini une douzaine de fois (au moins).
L'ambiance est bonne, les dialogues géniaux, et les personnages sont vraiment attachants (enfin, sauf le notre, évidemment). Le fait que notre avatar n'est ni identité, ni passé nous permet d'imaginer ce que l'on veut sur sa présence dans ce lieu (lui aussi très énigmatique !!).
Et la fin... L'une des meilleurs fin de jeux vidéos que j'ai pu voir.

My favorite puzzle game of all time! The gameplay is simple but it is all you need. The puzzles stay intersesting. But one of the greatest things about this game (in my opninion) is that it is not only about the puzzles. The weird story, characters, humor and dialogs are what really push you trough the game and make you wait in anticipation for what is going to happen after each puzzle.

It is also one of the few good puzzle games with coop. And with the level editor and workshop support there is almost endless replayability.

Great 3D puzzle game with portals and physics.
Improved version of the first one for sure.
It's bit longer with some story elements too.
Has great and funny characters that you will love,
intriguing backstory that you can find in locations,
ending song not as good as original but still fine.
In the end it is super fun in single player 
but even more fun with a friend in coop.
Wish I had more friends to play this game again ...
